description: Nice two closed bedrooms located on 2nd floor. Facing a bus stop, walking distance from Newman Blvd and buses toward Angrignon Shopping Center and Angrignon Metro Station. Hardwood floors for bedrooms and living room, floating floors for kitchen and dining area. Ceramic floor for bathroom. Recently repainted. Welcome non-smoking tenants and no pet.

address: 6189, Rue  Beaubien Est, Montréal (Mercier/Hochelaga-Maisonneuve), Neighbourhood New Rosemont
description: Très grand logement de 3 1/2, l'entrée séparée. La salle de bain et la cuisine seront rénovées à neuf. Un nouveau deck privé sera refait. Le logement sera disponible à partir de 20 juin 2021.

address: 4687, Rue  Beauvoir, Montréal (Saint-Léonard)

Parcs Écoles primaire et secondaire à quelques minutes de l appartement. Pièces de très bonnes dimension. planchers de bois, beaucoup d ensoleillement dans

address: 2300, Rue  Tupper, apt. 406, Montréal (Ville-Marie), Neighbourhood Central West
description: In the heart of Square Children's. The ESTWEST project invites you into the heart of a truly unique environment, comprising an Eastern-inspired EST tower and a WEST tower, reminiscent of the American West. This unit is brand new. A few minutes walk to Adonis, Atwater and Georges-Vanier Metro, Alexis Nihon Mall and other restaurants & boutiques.

address: 4754A, boulevard  Édouard-Montpetit, Montréal (Côte-des-Neiges/Notre-Dame-de-Grâce), Neighbourhood Côte-des-Neiges
3974, boulevard  Rosemont, Montréal (Rosemont/La Petite-Patrie), Neighbourhood Old Rosemont
description: Well renovated apartment with an ideal location in the Rosemont district. Very sunny rooms. All your errands can be done easily on foot. Several parks nearby, such as Étienne-Desmarteau Park, the Montreal Botanical Garden and Lafond Park. Come and see ! (Room dimensions to come)

address: 1188S, Rue  Saint-Antoine Ouest, Montréal (Ville-Marie), Neighbourhood Central
description: One parking (P3-029) in TDC2 for rent. The lessee must be an owner or tenant in phase 2 or 3 of the Tour des Canadiens. Contact me for more information.

address: 294, Rue  Villeneuve Ouest, apt. 15, Montréal (Le Plateau-Mont-Royal), Neighbourhood Mile-End
description: Mile-End. Charming apartment open concept in a building of character. One bright large bedroom. Modern bathroom and kitchen. High ceilings.

address: 1414, Rue  Chomedey, apt. 328, Montréal (Ville-Marie), Neighbourhood Central West
950, Rue  Notre-Dame Ouest, apt. 515, Montréal (Le Sud-Ouest), Neighbourhood Griffintown
description: The Lowney Phase V. Fabulous condo with open concept kitchen, one closed bedroom, ultramodern bathroom with rainfall shower, A/C. Locker and garage included. A great rooftop terrace with spa, infinity pool with an amazing view of the city.

address: 5000, Rue  Notre-Dame Ouest, apt. 102, Montréal (Le Sud-Ouest), Neighbourhood Saint-Henri/Petite Bourgogne

address: 7609A, Rue  Ravary, Montréal (LaSalle)
description: close to cegep,Angrignon park,metro and shopping mall,2 steps from Newman commecial street,2 min from fast lanes,well kept bachelor,new bathroom, occ July 1st,a must see.

address: 2118, Rue  Saint-Dominique, apt. 409B, Montréal (Ville-Marie), Neighbourhood Central
644, Rue  Saint-Philippe, apt. 8, Montréal (Le Sud-Ouest), Neighbourhood Saint-Henri/Petite Bourgogne
description: Modern apartment for rent. Located on the top floor on a quiet street. A few steps from Metro Place St-Henri, all the services of rue Saint-Jacques (grocery store, pharmacy, gym, public transportation) as well as the cafes and restaurants of Notre-Dame. Wall-mounted air conditioning, 5 appliances included, balcony with locker and outdoor parking.

address: 825, boulevard  René-Lévesque Est, apt. 601, Montréal (Ville-Marie), Neighbourhood Village
description: Great location downtown in a prestigious building. Bright condo with large windows. Bedroom with walk-in. Concrete building with superior soundproofing. Pool and terrace on the roof.

address: 1188, Avenue  Union, apt. 804, Montréal (Ville-Marie), Neighbourhood Central West
description: FULLY FURNISHED 1BDRM in one of Montreal's most prestigious high rise in the heart of Downtown. A hall leads to a open concept kitchen with separate bedroom and private balcony. Offering 5 star amenities including 24hr security & valet service, indoor pool, sauna, gym, reception room and outdoor terrace on the rooftop located on the 42nd floor.

address: 630, Rue  William, apt. 315, Montréal (Ville-Marie), Neighbourhood La Cité du Multimédia
description: Immeuble Lof McGill Ouest. Superbe condo moderne avec 1 chambre à coucher, immense balcon donnant sur la cour intérieure, très ensoleillé, Plafonds 9' béton. Fenestration abondante. À proximité des restos, bar et services, piste cyclable et Metro Square Victoria. Salle d'exercice et cour intérieure Espace de Rangement inclus.

address: 2195, Rue  De Chambly, Montréal (Mercier/Hochelaga-Maisonneuve), Neighbourhood Hochelaga-Maisonneuve
description: For rent year-round beautiful 4 1/2 with backyard yard, parking, 5 minutes from Joliette metro, promenade Ontario and its merchants. 2 bedrooms in the front, kitchen and dining room in the back overlooking its beautiful wooded courtyard. Shed and outdoor parking.

8205A, Rue de Domrémy, Montréal (Saint-Léonard)

address: 1414, Rue  Chomedey, apt. 323, Montréal (Ville-Marie), Neighbourhood Central West
description: Le Seville: Bright and spacious studio facing St-Catherine street. Modern building in downtown Montreal, steps away from Atwater Metro, Lasalle College, Dawson and Concordia.

address: 1055, Rue  Saint-Mathieu, apt. 840, Montréal (Ville-Marie), Neighbourhood Central West
description: A beautiful tastefully furnished apartment in a fantastic Location right in the heart of Downtown. Sunny unit with two windows. Close to all amenities. Heating, electricity, hot water, internet and TV included in the rent. Just a 2 minute walk to Guy-Concordia Metro at an unbeatable price. Who is the lucky tenant?

address: 1235, Rue  Bishop, apt. 1019, Montréal (Ville-Marie), Neighbourhood Golden Square Mile
description: Modern urban condo, 1 closed bedroom, balcony, high ceilings, wood floors, quartz countertop. Full of natural light and a superb unobstructed view of Mont-Royal. Amenities include a rooftop swimming pool, gym, sauna and terrace. Close to all services, shops, restaurants and downtown cultural life.

address: 1288, Avenue des Canadiens-de-Montréal, apt. 2905, Montréal (Ville-Marie), Neighbourhood Central West
description: Located at the heart of downtown Montreal, bright condo with a spectacular view of the beautiful city open concept living room and kitchen, floor to ceiling windows, and premium engineered wood flooring.
